doc.title: Economist wins Berlusconi court battle
doc.author: Roy Greenslade
doc.tags: Consumer magazines,Newspapers & magazines,Italy,Media,World news,Silvio Berlusconi,Magazines,The Economist,Europe

main.p: When he was Italian prime minister in 2001 Silvio Berlusconi sued The Economist in Italy for defamation over the above cover story. The magazine announced this afternoon that a Milan court has ruled against Berlusconi, rejecting all his claims and requiring him to make a payment for costs to The Economist. If you read Italian, you'll find the full judgment here. Of course, Berlusconi is once again Italy's prime minister.
